attributes.action: Stop the Patriotic Suppression of the British and European Peoples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the Indigenous Peoples of Britain and Europe love our countries, traditions, history's and cultures, Whilst we wish to trade within Europe and Worldwide we do not wish nor have ever granted permission to Surrender our Sovereignty to Full Integration into a European SuperState, This was shown by referendum in France and Holland. Although tolerant and Accomodating almost in the extreme we have never wished for the Mass Immigration which dilutes and ethnically cleanses Britain of our individual English, Scottish, Irish and Welsh Identities with 'Imported Europeans'.We call upon the Government to reduce and or reverse immigration to a level which does not threaten the inaliable human right of the British people and culture to exist.
We further call upon the Government to use it's Influence to ensure the Survival of our Similarly threatened European Neighbours.
